com.yahoo.labs.samoa.moa.classifiers.rules.core.voting

Interface ErrorWeightedVote

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractErrorWeightedVote, InverseErrorWeightedVote, UniformWeightedVote

    public interface ErrorWeightedVote
    ErrorWeightedVote interface for weighted votes based on estimates of errors.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1 $
    Author:
    Joao Duarte (jmduarte@inescporto.pt)

    • Method Detail

      • addVote

        void addVote(double[] vote,
           double error)
        Adds a vote and the corresponding error for the computation of the weighted vote and respective weighted error.
        Parameters:
        vote - a vote returned by a classifier
        error - the error associated to the vote

      • computeWeightedVote

        double[] computeWeightedVote()
        Computes the weighted vote. Also updates the weights of the votes.
        Returns:
        the weighted vote
